jsonvcard.name: jsonvcard
jsonvcard.description: Provides the scripts to generate a CV

JsonVCard.name: JsonVCard
JsonVCard.description:
This class doesn't do anything, it is here just to force YuiDoc
generating the documentation

params.name: value
params.description: String of text to slugify

classitems.description:
Initialization of process; this method searches for "vcard.json"
in the javascript location "jsonvcard.js".
Then when retrieved, it sends its content as a string to process(json)
Where it will be processed

params.name: jsonURL
params.description: The location of json file

classitems.description: This method parses the json content
classitems.name: processJSON

params.name: json
params.description: The content of JSON file

classitems.description:
This function is used to initiate the process of binding the
data with the template
classitems.name: cookTemplate

params.name: data
params.description: the data structure recovered from json file

params.name: template
params.description: the HTML template used to create the final HTML code

classitems.description: Save all template defined variables in a global variable called vars

params.name: template
params.description: the HTML template used to create the final HTML code

return.description: the HTML template after deliting variables

classitems.description: Process a theme element (json) which has a name and a style
classitems.name: processTheme

params.name: theme

return.description:
path to the template constructed from the theme name, or
the dafault one

classitems.description: Link a stylsheet to the current document
classitems.name: addStyleSheet

params.name: url
params.description: the URL of the tageted CSS

classitems.description: Process an object which contains many elements in it
classitems.name: processObject

params.name: key
params.description:
the name of this object, for example 
  "perso": {
     "name": "Karim",
     "family": "Aries"
  }
"perso" is the key, and the object is the data

params.name: data
params.description: the object to be processed

params.name: template
params.description: the HTML templated used to push the data

return.description: the HTML content after merging with the data

classitems.description:
Process the data of an object. It detects if the data is
an object, a list of elements or a simple element
classitems.name: processData

params.name: key
params.description: the name or key of the element; for example "perso.name"

params.name: value
params.description:
the value of the data: it may be an object, a list, or a simple element.
In our example, it is a simple string: "Karim"

params.name: template
params.description: the HTML template used to push the data

return.description: the HTML content after merging with the data

classitems.description:
Process the data of an array.
It recovers the begining and ending of this array in the template.
Then, it pushes each element of the array into that area.
classitems.name: processArray

params.name: key
params.description: the name or key of the array; for example "skill"

params.name: data
params.description:
the value of the data: it may be an object, a list, or a simple element.
In our example, it is a simple string: "javascript"

params.name: template
params.description: the HTML template used to push the data

return.description: the HTML content after merging with the data

classitems.description:
Process the files stored in a global variable (files) while processing
the json data and the template
classitems.name: processFiles

classitems.description:
Read a file and push the content into its reserved area in the template. Here, the content is pushed into a global variable containing the template. We can't use the template as an argument, nor return the merged html, because the files call is asynchronious.
A mutex is used so the html code is pushed into the browser once all the files are being processed
classitems.name: readFile

params.name: marker
params.description:
the marker which defines where in the template the content
should be pushed

params.name: url
params.description: the URL where to find the file

classitems.description: Special function to process social media links
classitems.name: process_social

params.name: data
params.description:
an object containing the name of the social network as a key and
the link as a value

params.name: template
params.description: the HTML template to be replaced
